trans-unit.source: Represents a single row of data and its metadata.
trans-unit.target: 表示单个行的数据和其元数据。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
This class is used together with <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlPipe> to send result sets to the client from managed code stored-procedures.
trans-unit.target: 此类使用连同<xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlPipe>从托管的代码存储过程将结果集发送到客户端。</xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlPipe>

trans-unit.source: When writing common language runtime (CLR) applications, you should re-use existing `SqlDataRecord` objects instead of creating new ones every time.
trans-unit.target: 如果编写公共语言运行时 (CLR) 应用程序，则应重新使用现有`SqlDataRecord`而不是每次创建新的对象。

trans-unit.source: Creating many new `SqlDataRecord` objects could severely deplete memory and adversely affect performance.
trans-unit.target: 创建很多新`SqlDataRecord`对象无法严重消耗内存，并对性能产生负面影响。

trans-unit.source: Inititializes a new <xref href="Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlDataRecord"></xref> instance with the schema based on the array of <xref href="Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlMetaData"></xref> objects passed as an argument.
trans-unit.target: 初始化新<xref href="Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlDataRecord"></xref>的架构针对整个数组基于<xref href="Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlMetaData"></xref>对象作为参数传递。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlMetaData"></xref> objects that describe each column in the <xref href="Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlDataRecord"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref href="Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlMetaData"></xref>描述中的每个列的对象<xref href="Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlDataRecord"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The metaData is .
Gets the number of columns in the data row.
This property is read-only.
The number of columns in the data row as an integer.
trans-unit.target: 整数形式的数据行中的列数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value for the column specified by the ordinal as a <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 获取作为一种<xref:System.Boolean>。</xref:System.Boolean>序号指定的列的值

trans-unit.source: The zero-based ordinal of the column.
The column value as a <xref:System.Boolean>.
The ordinal is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns (that is, ).
trans-unit.target: ordinal 小于 0 或大于列数 (即， )。

trans-unit.source: The column specified by ordinal is null.
There is a type mismatch.
Gets the value for the column specified by the ordinal as a <xref:System.Byte>.
trans-unit.target: 获取作为一种<xref:System.Byte>。</xref:System.Byte>序号指定的列的值

trans-unit.source: The zero-based ordinal of the column.
The column value as a <xref:System.Byte>.
The ordinal is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns (that is, ).
trans-unit.target: ordinal 小于 0 或大于列数 (即， )。

trans-unit.source: The column specified by ordinal is null.
There is a type mismatch.
Gets the value for the column specified by the ordinal as an array of <xref:System.Byte> objects.
trans-unit.target: 获取序号所指定的数组作为列的值<xref:System.Byte>对象。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to obtain a binary value either in a single call or in chunks.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可以获取二进制值的单次调用中或小区块中。

trans-unit.source: Getting the value in chunks is useful for large values or values of unknown size.
trans-unit.target: 小区块中获取的值可用于大的值或未知大小的值。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the value in several chunks, allocate a byte array of the chunk-size and call GetBytes repeatedly, adjusting the `fieldOffset` parameter accordingly in each call.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取几个块区中的值，请分配块区大小的字节数组，调用 GetBytes 重复，调整`fieldOffset`参数相应地在每次调用。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based ordinal of the column.
The offset into the field value to start retrieving bytes.
trans-unit.target: 偏移量开始检索字节的字段值。

trans-unit.source: The target buffer to which to copy bytes.
trans-unit.target: 要将字节复制到目标缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: The offset into the buffer to which to start copying bytes.
trans-unit.target: 要开始将字节复制到缓冲区中偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to copy to the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 要复制到缓冲区的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes copied.
The ordinal is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns (that is, ).
trans-unit.target: ordinal 小于 0 或大于列数 (即， )。

trans-unit.source: The column specified by ordinal is null.
There is a type mismatch.
Gets the value for the column specified by the ordinal as a <xref:System.Char>.
trans-unit.target: 获取作为一种<xref:System.Char>。</xref:System.Char>序号指定的列的值

trans-unit.source: The zero-based ordinal of the column.
The column value as a <xref:System.Char>.
The ordinal is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns (that is, ).
trans-unit.target: ordinal 小于 0 或大于列数 (即， )。

trans-unit.source: The column specified by ordinal is null.
There is a type mismatch.
Gets the value for the column specified by the ordinal as an array of <xref:System.Char> objects.
trans-unit.target: 获取序号所指定的数组作为列的值<xref:System.Char>对象。</xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to obtain a character value either in a single call or in chunks.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可获取的单次调用中或小区块中的字符值。

trans-unit.source: Getting the value in chunks is useful for large values or values of unknown size.
trans-unit.target: 小区块中获取的值可用于大的值或未知大小的值。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the value in several chunks, allocate a char array of the chunk-size and call GetChars repeatedly adjusting the `fieldOffset` parameter accordingly in each call.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取几个块区中的值，分配 char 的块区大小的数组并调用 GetChars 重复调整`fieldOffset`参数相应地在每次调用。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based ordinal of the column.
The offset into the field value to start retrieving characters.
trans-unit.target: 偏移量开始检索字符的字段值。

trans-unit.source: The target buffer to copy chars to.
trans-unit.target: 要复制的目标缓冲区字符复制到其中。

trans-unit.source: The offset into the buffer to start copying chars to.
trans-unit.target: 中的偏移量的缓冲区开始复制字符复制到其中。

trans-unit.source: The number of chars to copy to the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 要复制到缓冲区的字符数。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters copied.
The ordinal is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns (that is, ).
trans-unit.target: ordinal 小于 0 或大于列数 (即， )。

trans-unit.source: The column specified by ordinal is null.
There is a type mismatch.
Returns the name of the data type for the column specified by the ordinal argument.
trans-unit.target: 返回序号参数指定的列的数据类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the type name as known in the SQL Server type-system.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回的类型名称，因为 SQL Server 类型系统中识别。

trans-unit.source: For user-defined types (UDTs), it returns the three-part name that was used to register the type with SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: 对于用户定义类型 (Udt)，它将返回用于注册 SQL Server 类型的由三部分名称。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based ordinal of the column.
A <xref:System.String> that contains the data type of the column.
The ordinal is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns (that is, ).
trans-unit.target: ordinal 小于 0 或大于列数 (即， )。

trans-unit.source: For null values, a SQL Server type instance is returned where the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable.IsNull%2A> property is true.
trans-unit.target: SQL Server 类型实例为 null 值，并返回 where<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable.IsNull%2A>属性为 true。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable.IsNull%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ordinal is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns (that is, ).
trans-unit.target: ordinal 小于 0 或大于列数 (即， )。

trans-unit.source: There is a type mismatch.
Returns the values for all the columns in the record, expressed as SQL Server types, in an array.
trans-unit.target: 返回记录中的所有列的值表示为 SQL Server 类型，在一个数组中。

trans-unit.source: The SQL Server type values of the column are copied into the `values` array that is passed as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: SQL Server 类型值的列复制到`values`作为参数传递的数组。

trans-unit.source: For null values, a Sql type instance is returned where the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable.IsNull%2A> property is true.
trans-unit.target: Sql 类型实例为 null 值，并返回 where<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable.IsNull%2A>属性为 true。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable.IsNull%2A>

trans-unit.source: The length of the `values` array does not need to match the number of columns in the record.
trans-unit.target: 长度`values`数组不需要匹配的记录中的列数。

trans-unit.source: If the array length is greater than the number of columns, all of the column values are copied into the array; if it is less, only the array length number of column values are copied into the array, starting at the column value with ordinal 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果数组长度大于列数，所有的列的值复制到数组中;如果该值小于，只有数组长度数量的列的值复制到数组，从列序号 0 值开始。

trans-unit.source: The array into which to copy the values column values.
trans-unit.target: 要将值列值复制到的数组。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> that indicates the number of columns copied.
